description:
Collect inventory data and metrics of your hosts and sends it to the New Relic platform.


What's Changed
- ci: remove 32 bit windows builds in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2144
- fix: cpu performance counters not working on non-English systems in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2154
- deps: update fluent-bit version on windows in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2156
- chore(deps): update dependency version in https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/pull/2159
Full Changelog: https://github.com/newrelic/infrastructure-agent/compare/1.71.1...1.71.2
